shareParams.title: Parameters sharing
shareParams.description:
You requested to share parameters with {REMOTE_USER} account.

If you agree, parameters from current account, {CURRENT_USER}, will be replaced by the ones of {REMOTE_USER}.
Then, any change from one account will be applied to the other.

This includes your triggers, chat column filters, chat features, chat appearances, counters, values, overlays, TTS, automod params, ... Everything.
shareParams.success:
You are now sharing your data with {USER}

Reload Twitchat to get your shared data
shareParams.error:
Something went wrong when finishing data sharing process.
Your data remain not shared.
